Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: I got a fair bit done with gps. Hardware is solid, though got a bigger battery on order and some tweaks to firmware pending to make more efficient. Data payload  is light, gets to server via curl over 3G. Server encrypts payload with aes256 and writes it to the oracle.  Another script queries the oracle, decrypts it back into into coordinates - only the publisher has the password to decrypt. Only really got the front end to connect to it all, and maybe some bash to py translation.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: I just got the miner working with notarisations = MAX_PRIORITY

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: This means that unless someone goes into the daemon code and removes this, and then mines ALL of the blocks... even under maximum full block conditions notarisations will be confirmed in 1 or 2 blocks.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Also have wallet code working, that auto activates if the node is running with a STAKED notary -pubkey.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: This code, rejects all txs under a certain size, so under txblast the notary nodes just ignore it... and you can start the deamon without your -pubkey, recan and z_mergetoaddress alll the free money, or just do that on another node, leaving the notary to notarize.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: you asked for it @Alright  and i worked it out. Staked notary nodes are now immune to dwy attack! üòÑ
